title: Jump Trading Set To Gain Stakes In Kalshi, Polymarket
description: Jump Trading is set to gain small stakes in Kalshi Inc. and Polymarket in exchange for providing liquidity on the prediction-market platforms, according to people with knowledge of the matter. Bloomberg's Katherine Doherty has the story. (Source: Bloomberg)
